title: Updated 2 bedrooms/1 bath available in University Hills
posting_body: The house has everything you need!
Everything has been updated including floors, kitchen, bathroom, bedrooms and backyard space.
Conveniently located with easy access to I-25 and is walking distance to the Yale light rail station.
The house has a great backyard space for entertaining and backs up to the highline canal.
The attached garage is great for Colorado winters.
Contact no: (786) 438-53_)__57 (TEXT ME HOUSE ADDRESS WHILE INQUIRING ALONG WITH YOUR EMAIL)
